metadata.title: CVE-2023-38283 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In OpenBGPD before 8.1, incorrect handling of BGP update data (length ofpath attributes) set by a potentially distant remote actor may cause thesystem to incorrectly reset a session. This is fixed in OpenBSD 7.3 errata006.

criterions.comment: openbgpd package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
